title: Typefaces
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121152/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Typefaces**

This wiki category is not intended to be a comprehensive list of typefaces. It is however a place to catalogue prominent typefaces of significant historical importance or of exemplary influence.

**Categories**

[American Book Faces](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121152/http:/typophile.com/wiki/American%20Book%20Faces)  
 ["Essential" Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121152/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Essential%20Typefaces)  
 [Featured Faces](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121152/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Featured%20Face)  
 [Superfamilies](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121152/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Superfamilies)  
 [Rounded Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121152/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rounded%20Typefaces)

**Additional Articles:**  
 [Font Starter Packs](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121152/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Starter%20Packs)

**Individual Faces**
